column1: Hi i was thinking of going to croatia next week from austria. does anyone know what is the situattion at the border with slovenia when you go to croatia and when you come back? thank you
There is no situation. You can go and return without any impediments.
You can find the latest updates regarding Covid situation on the official tourism board websitehttps:/â€¦coronavirus-2019-ncov-q-and-aHope it helps and enjoy your vacation.
